Are you a creative storyteller who can translate technical concepts into compelling market messages? Got a passion for technology, healthcare, and marketing? We’re looking for a Technical Product Marketing leader to tell the world why interoperability standards like FHIR are so crucial, and how InterSystems empowers software developers, healthcare organizations, MedTech innovators and others to connect and manage health information. This positions is based in Cambridge, MA, and works closely with our Product teams, regional Sales and Marketing teams across the world, and Corporate Marketing to develop messaging, programs, and Go-To-Market strategies for healthcare interoperability and data management capabilities across the InterSystems product portfolio including InterSystems HealthShare® unified care record product suite, InterSystems TrakCare®, our global health information system, and InterSystems IRIS for Health™.

see https://www.intersystems.com/who-we-are/careers/careers-search/?gh_jid=4348387003.

US citizenship not required, but candidate must live (or move to) Cambridge
